titles.title: Homeless Children's Immunization Assistance Act

To amend the title IV of Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act to require operators of emergency shelters and transitional housing assisted under such title to determine the immunization status of children under the age of 6 occupying such housing.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

term.name: Federal aid to child health services

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Homeless Children's Immunization Assistance Act - Amends the Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act to require operators of specified emergency shelters and transitional housing to determine the immunization status of children under the age of six years old occupying such housing.
